eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class AbstractEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.AbstractEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edge, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineEdge

    public abstract class AbstractEdge
extends java.lang.Object
implements Edge
    A class that supplies convenience implementations for a number of methods in the Edge interface type.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
